For the stew: ½ skinless chicken breast, sliced into strips
3 cardamom pods, seeds removed and crushed

steps: For the stew, heat the oil in a frying pan and add the onion and sweet potato. Sauté for 2-3 minutes then add the chicken, crushed cardamom seeds, bay leaves and paprika. Then add the wine, water, stock cube and cream, stirring well. Simmer for five minutes or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has reduced by half. Pour into a serving bowl and put aside.
For the coriander and lime paste, place the ingredients into a mini food processor and blend together until smooth.
Spoon the paste over the stew and serve.
title: Sweet potato and chicken stew with coriander and lime paste
